TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlGenericControl extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 定義不是由特定 .NET Framework 類別所代表之所有 HTML 伺服器控制項項目的方法、屬性和事件。

span.span: Defines the methods, properties, and events for all HTML server control elements not represented by a specific .NET Framework class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此類別代表 HTML 伺服器控制項項目不是直接表示由.NET Framework 類別，例如``， `
`， ``，或``。Use this class to represent an HTML server control element not directly represented by a .NET Framework class, such as ``, `
`, ``, or ``. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)並[驗證 ASP.NET Web Pages 中的使用者輸入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133) and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來代表``項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to represent the `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlGenericControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlGenericControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別使用的預設值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 它通常用來以動態方式建立伺服器端``項目。It is commonly used to dynamically create a server-side `` element. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagName`|「 跨越 」 常值字串。The "span" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體類別使用的預設建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class using the default constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的標記。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified tag. 這可讓您以動態方式建立的.NET Framework 類別不是直接表示任何 HTML 伺服器控制項項目。This allows you to dynamically create any HTML server control element not directly represented by a .NET Framework class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagName`|`tag` 參數的值。The value of the `tag` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 如果`tag`參數是`null`，則屬性設定為。If the `tag` parameter is `null`, the property is set to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體類別使用的多載的建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class using the overloaded constructor. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor/CS/htmlgenericcontrolconstructoroverloadcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor/VB/htmlgenericcontrolconstructoroverloadvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定由 控制項表示的 HTML 項目名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the HTML element represented by the control.
The tag name of an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以用於以程式設計方式判斷 HTML 伺服器控制項的項目名稱。Use this property to programmatically determine the element name of the HTML server control. 例如，屬性進行伺服器端``元素包含值 「 範圍 」。For example, the property for a server-side `` element contains the value "span". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以程式設計方式變更 「 字型 」 從 「 主體 」 的標記名稱和備份的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically change a tag name from "Body" to "Font" and back. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
